title: Adam Wallace-Harrison
text: Adam Wallace-Harrison (born 24 September 1979 in <a href="Perth">Perth</a>, Western Australia) is a <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> footballer who plays professionally for the <a href="Queensland%20Reds">Queensland Reds</a> in <a href="Super%20Rugby">Super Rugby</a>. His regular playing position is <a href="Lock%20%28rugby%20union%29">lock</a>. He has previously played for the <a href="ACT%20Brumbies">Brumbies</a> and <a href="NTT%20Communications%20Shining%20Arcs">NTT Communications Shining Arcs</a>.
